name: Pink Cube Does Not Want to Burn Alive.
name_original: Pink Cube Does Not Want to Burn Alive.
description:
Pink cube does not want to burn alive.

Pink cube also likes abstract yellow particle systems that represent points.

Can pink cube get those abstract points and not get set ablaze?

It depends how good you are at the game.

GAMEPLAY

Traverse around a small island to collect points to achieve a high score, or any score at all. 

But standing in your way will be fire, and fire is hot. Keep collecting points and the island will gradually become covered in even more blazing infernos, making points harder and harder to safely reach. It actually becomes pretty difficult.

Also don't fall off the edge into the water because drowning is bad and pink cube cannot swim.

CONTROLS

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move and spacebar to jump. Use the mouse to press buttons.
